system.requirement: If you wield an iwisa club made of stout leadwood...

abilities.description: Your iwisa counts as a deadly weapon inflicting 2 harm. Additionally, when you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} +edge by thorwing your iwisa, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} and score a strong hit, take +1 momentum as the enemy is dazed. Then, if your next move is a @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} and you score a weak hit, you do not lose initiative.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} by blocking incoming attacks with your iwisa, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
